content: Thanks for creating this stream! I am in Oxford. While I am working in algebraic geometry, I recently took up a keen interest in type theory and LEAN.

I'm a lecturer at the CS department of U. of Oxford, and work a lot on various open-source computer algebra projects, mostly SageMath (and I also write maths papers). I know too much about Python, git, bash etc, and too little about proof systems.
(Wow this thread is inactive) Hello, I'll be in Oxford starting from next week (one year masters) :) Coincidentally I am also a SageMath contributor like Dima.
I work on elliptic curve things in SageMath, and in Mathlib I do all kinds of NT things
